channel.title: Action – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Sniper Clash 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Take a role of a secret agent sniper to infiltrate and seize the trophy relic from the evil desert nomads.*WASD* = move*SPACE* = jump*C* = crouch*TAB* = score table
item.content:encoded:
Take a role of a secret agent sniper to infiltrate and seize the trophy relic from the evil desert nomads.
*WASD* = move*SPACE* = jump*C* = crouch*TAB* = score table

item.title: Subway Clash Remastered
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fight in an underground area of Moscow metro full of angry KGB soldiers trying to bring you down.*WASD* = move*SPACE* = jump*C* = crouch*TAB* = score table
item.content:encoded:
Fight in an underground area of Moscow metro full of angry KGB soldiers trying to bring you down.
*WASD* = move*SPACE* = jump*C* = crouch*TAB* = score table

item.title: Christmas Buster
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Enjoy this Bubble Shooter game for Christmas. Shoot bubbles up and make groups of three or more same bubbles.
item.content:encoded: Enjoy this Bubble Shooter game for Christmas. Shoot bubbles up and make groups of three or more same bubbles.

item.title: BubbleShooter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Shoot the Bubbles. Shoot up and match 3 or more of the same color.
item.content:encoded: Shoot the Bubbles. Shoot up and match 3 or more of the same color.

item.title: Mafia Trick & Blood 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: – Playing in the genre of three-dimensional adventure action- Big city- Territory and business control- Gun shop, with tons of firearms, and all the necessary- Shop with a large selection of vehicles- The exciting plot of the life of a gangster- Aesthetics of the mid-20th century- Time trial, survival chase- Racket and gangsPlot:You have a […]
item.content:encoded:
– Playing in the genre of three-dimensional adventure action- Big city- Territory and business control- Gun shop, with tons of firearms, and all the necessary- Shop with a large selection of vehicles- The exciting plot of the life of a gangster- Aesthetics of the mid-20th century- Time trial, survival chase- Racket and gangsPlot:You have a big business, in a city that doesn’t sleep and sometimes gives you dangerous adventures and makes you stick in new scrape, from which it’s impossible to get out without victims. To capture the city is one thing, where it is more difficult to hold onto the boss of all the underground enterprises and not to lose your reputation.You expect crazy chases and shootouts with police and enemies from rival gangs. The spies and traitors will be turned into your family. Racing in fast cars, through the streets will add adrenaline to the blood. Shooting and explosions will not leave you alone until you show the city that you still have gunpowder in your powder flasks.
*12*= switch weapon*mouse*= look, shoot, aim, switch weapon*space*= jump*E*=sit or exit car*WASD*= move or drive*P*= pause*shift*= rear mirror*V*= switch car camera

item.title: Fruit Snake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fruit Snake is a classic game of snake in a color version, in which you need to collect fruits, for each eaten fruit added extra time! Tap or arrow keys to move. Enjoy the game!PC: Arrow keys to move. Mobile Phone: Tap buttons on screen to move.
item.content:encoded:
Fruit Snake is a classic game of snake in a color version, in which you need to collect fruits, for each eaten fruit added extra time! Tap or arrow keys to move. Enjoy the game!
PC: Arrow keys to move. Mobile Phone: Tap buttons on screen to move.

item.title: Fruity Snake
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Welcome in Fruity Snake. Play with the little snake in the funny Html 5 game. Make your snake as long as possible. The more fruits you collect, the more points you get. Tap on screen to move. Enjoy!Tap or mouse click to play.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome in Fruity Snake. Play with the little snake in the funny Html 5 game. Make your snake as long as possible. The more fruits you collect, the more points you get. Tap on screen to move. Enjoy!
Tap or mouse click to play.

item.title: Monkey Banana Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!Tap or click arrow key to play.
item.content:encoded:
This is a jumping endless game. The monkey is hungry. You need to control him to jump and collect as many bananas as possible. New fruits will give him magic power, enjoy!
Tap or click arrow key to play.

item.title: Fruit Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Young ninjas hide in the fast-growing world of modern times and even drink juice is so cool. In Fruit Master, you need to throw a dagger and cut the fruit to squeeze the juice. The operation is extremely simple. Throw a dagger and cut the fruit. The fruit in the air is spinning so you […]
item.content:encoded:
Young ninjas hide in the fast-growing world of modern times and even drink juice is so cool. In Fruit Master, you need to throw a dagger and cut the fruit to squeeze the juice. The operation is extremely simple. Throw a dagger and cut the fruit. The fruit in the air is spinning so you may hit nothing. And the difficulty of the game will gradually increase. Can you become a fruit master? Come and have fun.
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Honor Of Kings Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.PCMouse click and drag to […]
item.content:encoded:
King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.
PCMouse click and drag to move, and click the button to attackMobileTap and slide to move,  and tap the button to attack
